General.Name: Saietta Group PLC
General.Description: Saietta Group plc designs, engineers, manufactures, and sells light duty and heavy duty electric drive systems for electric vehicles. It offers engineering services, including market research and product definition, CAE and simulation, e-motor electrical and mechanical integration, prototype build, and vehicle testing services. The company also provides engineering design, testing, and prototype services. In addition, it designs, develops, and commercializes various electric motors for electrification of the marine industry. Saietta Group plc was incorporated in 2008 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
